title: It Follows
creator_credit: David Robert Mitchell, Two Flints, Northern Lights Films, Animal Kingdom, Michael Perry, Erik Rommesmo, Laura D. Smith, Kimberly Leitz, Rebecca Green and David Kaplan
brief_description: After carefree teenager Jay sleeps with her new boyfriend, Hugh, for the first time, she learns that she is the latest recipient of a fatal curse that is passed from victim to victim via sexual intercourse.

constellations_other.name: Electric Sound Supercut: composers and their distinctive other worlds
constellations_other.description: Electric sound is commonly associated with science fiction narratives for its auditory oddness, which has symbolised other worldly environments, the unconscious and the 1980s.

creator_credit_for_label: David Robert Mitchell, Two Flints, Northern Lights Films, Animal Kingdom, Michael Perry, Erik Rommesmo, Laura D. Smith, Kimberly Leitz, Rebecca Green and David Kaplan
description: After carefree teenager Jay sleeps with her new boyfriend, Hugh, for the first time, she learns that she is the latest recipient of a fatal curse that is passed from victim to victim via sexual intercourse. Death, Jay learns, will creep inexorably toward her as either a friend or a stranger. Jay’s friends don’t believe her seemingly paranoid ravings, until they too begin to see the phantom assassins and band together to help her flee or defend herself.
